title: The World Wide Web in the Face of Future Internet Architectures
abstract:
The World Wide Web WWW has arguably been the most popular application of the
Internet for years. Over a period of time, it has developed over the principles
of host centric IP internet. However, the limitations of todays host centric IP
internet have motivated many future internet architectures that are centered
around alternate principals such as content and services.
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Networking and Internet Architecture
